snippet.title: Unconventional Warfare - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
[This trailer is a reupload from our old channel]
In this top-down tactical shooter RPG, guide a band of cute soldiers through a warzone to safety. Rescue, train and manage your squad for the upcoming war of survival.

- Download our latest demo on itch.io!
https://duque.itch.io/uw
- Support Unconventional Warfare on Patreon today!
https://www.patreon.com/UnWar
- Add Unconventional Warfare to your Steam Wishlist!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/831110/Unconventional_Warfare/
- Follow us on Twitter and join our Discord server!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/UnWarGame
Discord: http://discord.gg/yVwypGJ
